rērum creātor: sīs praesul ad custōdiam. ^ that in thy wonted kindness
poscimus: thou wouldst be protector and keeper.

rērum creātor: et noctium fantasmata; ^ let dreams retire far away
ne polluantur corpora. ^ so also hinder our enemy
poscimus: that our bodies may be not corrupted.

rērum creātor: regnat cum Sanctō Spīritu. Āmen. ^ Who with you forever
poscimus: reigns with the Holy Spirit. Amen.
